# Macroeconomic Data {#data .unnumbered}

The next few chapters consider the meaning and measurement of some important macroeconomic variables.

## The Role of Data {#role_of_data .unnumbered}

To see whether an economy faces a macroeconomic problem, you first need data.

* Data help policy makers spot the problems, if any, that need to be addressed
* Data help macroeconomists identify the theories that make correct predictions and the theories that make incorrect predictions
* Data often reveal interesting puzzles that macroeconomic theories then try to solve
